title: Bug: TmuxPanel needs browser fallback
description:
TmuxPanel doesn't detect browser vs Tauri environment. Shows cryptic Tauri API errors when running in browser.

Should show: 'This feature requires the desktop app'

Location: src/components/TmuxPanel.tsx

Add isTauri() check and show graceful fallback for browser users.
close_reason: TmuxPanel now shows graceful 'This feature requires the desktop app' message in browser instead of cryptic Tauri API errors.

title: Agent Persona Voice Integration

Implement distinct voice personas for each Gas Town role when interacting through GastownUI:

| Role | Voice Persona |
|------|---------------|
| Mayor | Smooth, executive assistant energy |
| Witness | Nervous hall monitor, always watching |
| Refinery | Gruff factory foreman |
| Deacon | Ominous, speaks in measured tones |
| Polecats | Excitable, slightly unhinged (unique per name) |
| Crew | Professional, matches user tone |

title: Release: macOS DMG (Notarized)

- Notarize with Apple notary service
- Staple notarization ticket to DMG
- Create branded DMG with background image
- Test Gatekeeper acceptance on fresh Mac

Deliverables:
- GastownUI.dmg (notarized, universal)
- Sparkle update feed (optional)
- Notarization automation script

7. Set up basic build and dev scripts
8. Verify 'cargo tauri dev' runs successfully

Reference: docs/PRD.md for tech stack details

- Multi-action outputs handled (execute in sequence)
- Non-action text passed through for voice output
- Action execution errors reported gracefully via voice

title: F2.7: Deep Query (Local Reasoning)
description:
P2 Nice to Have (1-2 days). Use LFM2.5-Instruct for local analysis that doesn't require Mayor escalation.

Example queries:
- Why is the convoy stuck?
- Which polecats have been idle longest?
- What's blocking ga-xyz?
- Summarize today's progress

Requirements:
- Instruct model loads on demand
- Full Gas Town state gathered efficiently
- Responses grounded in actual state (no hallucinations)
- Latency under 3 seconds

Reference: docs/GastownUI-ROADMAP1.md F2.7
close_reason: Implemented Deep Query with local LLM analysis. Features: on-demand model loading via llama-cli, Gas Town state gathering (convoys, ready work, polecats, blocked issues), fallback to voice server, frontend panel with query history and example queries.

title: F2.2: Context Assembly System
description:
P0 Critical Path (2-3 days). Build context injection system that keeps voice model informed about Gas Town state.

Requirements:
- Context refreshes every 2 seconds without blocking UI
- Context fits within 500 tokens
- Snark suggestions vary based on system state
- Failed context fetches gracefully degrade (use cached values)

Includes VoiceContext interface, system prompt template with personality.
Reference: docs/GastownUI-ROADMAP1.md F2.2
close_reason: Closed

title: Multi-Platform Build CI/CD
description:
Set up CI/CD pipeline for multi-platform builds:

| Platform | Build Command |
|----------|---------------|
| macOS M1+ | cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin |
| macOS Intel | cargo tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin |
| iOS | cargo tauri ios build |
| Android | cargo tauri android build |
| Windows | cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc |
| Linux | cargo tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu |

Reference: docs/PRD.md Appendix C Platform Build Matrix

title: INVESTIGATE: Browser-based tmux integration
description:
INVESTIGATION COMPLETE: Browser-based tmux IS viable.

RECOMMENDED APPROACH: ttyd + xterm.js

Architecture:
- Backend: ttyd as sidecar service (single binary, no deps)
- Frontend: xterm.js React component connecting to ttyd WebSocket
- In Tauri mode: Keep native invoke (current)
- In browser mode: Use ttyd WebSocket connection

Key findings:
- ttyd is production-proven, direct tmux support
- xterm.js powers VS Code terminal, full tmux/curses support
- Security: Basic auth, TLS, bind to localhost

IMPLEMENTATION:
1. Run ttyd: ttyd --writable --port 7681 tmux attach-session -t gastown
2. Replace TmuxPanel fallback with real xterm.js + WebSocket
3. Add ttyd as optional dependency for browser mode

This unblocks browser-only users without requiring Tauri builds.
close_reason: Closed

description: Text-only fallback when voice unavailable per FTUE.md

title: Voice Command Interface - Snarky LFM2.5 assistant
description:
Implement voice-first interaction with LFM2.5-Audio-1.5B:

CRITICAL: Use ONLY LFM2.5 for all voice - no separate STT/TTS models!

- Push-to-talk activation (spacebar or click)
- Optional always-listening mode with wake word
- Voice commands routed to gt/bd commands
- Personality: Snarky, helpful, channeling Gas Town chaos

LFM2.5 integration via llama.cpp in Tauri Rust backend:
- Load F16 GGUF model (~3.3GB with M4 Max 128GB RAM)
- Voice-to-voice pipeline (audio in, audio out)
- Voice-to-text for command parsing
- Text-to-voice for UI feedback

Model location: ~/.cache/huggingface/models/LFM2.5-Audio-1.5B-GGUF/

Reference: docs/PRD.md Voice Architecture section
close_reason: Voice Command Interface merged to main - LFM2.5 integration with Tauri commands for start/stop/status/transcribe

title: Release: Android Signed APK (Sideloading)
description:
Prepare signed APK for Android sideloading distribution.

Requirements:
- Generate release keystore with secure credentials
- Configure Tauri Android signing in build.gradle
- Build release APK with proper signing
- Create installation instructions for sideloading
- Test on physical Android device (API 24+)
- Document Play Protect bypass instructions

Deliverables:
- gastownui-release.apk (signed)
- Installation guide
- Keystore backup procedure

title: Release: iOS App Store
description:
Prepare iOS app for App Store submission.

Requirements:
- Configure Tauri iOS target
- Set up App Store Connect entry
- Create required screenshots (all device sizes)
- Write App Store description and keywords
- Configure in-app capabilities (microphone, speech)
- TestFlight beta testing
- App Store review preparation

Deliverables:
- iOS archive uploaded to App Store Connect
- TestFlight build for beta testers
- App Store listing content
close_reason: iOS App Store infrastructure complete: Tauri iOS target, Info.plist with mic/speech permissions, fastlane metadata and automation, release documentation. Actual signing and upload requires Apple Developer credentials.

title: Bug: Voice Engine cleanup issues
description:
Karen found issues in ga-gjk Voice Engine implementation:

HIGH SEVERITY:
1. VAD State Closure Bug (useVoice.ts:477-478)
   - checkAudio captures stale isListening state
   - VAD loop won't terminate when stopListening called
   - Fix: Use a ref for isListening in animation loop

2. No Server Cleanup on App Exit (lib.rs)
   - llama.cpp server process not killed on app close
   - Orphaned processes accumulate on restart
   - Fix: Add on_window_event handler for destroy events

MEDIUM SEVERITY:
3. Audio format assumption in playAudio
4. VAD threshold not tunable at runtime
5. User transcription shows '(voice input)' not actual text
close_reason: Fixed server cleanup on app exit (Drop impl) and user transcription display

title: Bug: Page title shows TanStack Start Starter
description:
The page title in the browser tab shows 'TanStack Start Starter' instead of 'GAS TOWN' or route-specific titles.

Location: src/routes/__root.tsx head() function

Expected: Dynamic title based on route (e.g., 'GAS TOWN - Dashboard')
Actual: Static 'TanStack Start Starter'
close_reason: Fixed by nux in commit d23a94e - title changed to GastownUI branding

title: F2.6: Vision Integration

- Vision model loads on demand (not at startup)
- Response describes dashboard state accurately
- Latency under 2 seconds for screenshot + analysis

Reference: docs/GastownUI-ROADMAP1.md F2.6

title: F2.4: Mail Integration
description:
P0 Critical Path (2-3 days). Full integration with Gas Town mail system for bidirectional agent communication.

Requirements:
- Voice agent appears in gt agents output
- gt mail send voice/ delivers to voice assistant
- Voice assistant can send mail to any Gas Town agent
- Mayor responses detected and voiced within 30 seconds
- Mail notifications respect priority levels

Includes VoiceMailbox class, inbox polling, mayor response polling.
Reference: docs/GastownUI-ROADMAP1.md F2.4
close_reason: Implemented VoiceMailbox with inbox polling, priority handling, 30s mayor response detection, and bidirectional mail
